description: In major local news, a technical fault shut down the new West Gate Tunnel, and former socialite Brynne Edelsten faces court over serious drug trafficking allegations. Internationally, we look at the growing tension between Donald Trump and European leaders over his pursuit of Greenland, and the latest security developments for Ukraine from the summit in Paris.
